publicationStmt.p: Indication of work done and date 06/08/16, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To cash pd on the 15th unit
To cash fifty Dollars as pr receipt.
To cash when going to Providence
By work from Aug. 22 at 3/ pr dy
By work from Aug. 23 at 3/ pr day
With Geo. Braman as pr. Bill
To absence one day to Taunton 3/
Goods of Mr. Kelly as pr. Bk.
3 Skns Italian Silk 12x fr Box W. 4
To paying Col. Stone for Pew
To Goods from Store as pr. book
To cash seventy five Dollars as pr receipt towards gymnatrium
